p: The results of each compound were reported in Table 6. The results show the contacts of LC 50, TGI, and GI 50 values. The compound 1a (GI 50 = 0.69 μM) was high, while Cu-Nps-Pyr-1a (GI 50 = 0.01 μm) showed a significant activity against the HeLa cancer cell line. The compound 1b (GI 50 = 02.1 μM) and Cu-Nps-Pyr-1b (GI 50 = 0.01 μM) showed rightful activity against the HepG2 cell line compared with standard doxorubicin. All compounds displayed a moderate activity against all the cell line, whereas when compound with Cu nanoparticles, it is becoming highly responsive in cytotoxic scanning.
